title: Over the Line
description: Two brothers so sexy she can't stay away. But if they learn the truth, she'll lose them both. Lila has been away from her small hometown for so long she practically forgot how hot Levi and Eli Jackson were. Practically. But now that she's thrust back into her old life she can't escape the brothers or her past. Her secrets are catching up with her, despite her best efforts to keep them buried. Levi is a football star. Eli, a successful businessman. And they're both as attractive as ever. But they can't know what happened all those years ago. Even when they're trying to pull her back in. So what's a girl to do? What would you do? Over the Line is a full length standalone second chance romance. This story has some wild times between two brothers and the girl of their dreams. No M/M scenes. There is NO Cliffhanger and a HEA.
author: Nicole Elliot
